markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mindfog Mist](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3341)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=634" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=669" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 293 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 250 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Mindfog mist can be used to undermine spellcasters, as its effect on a victim's mental faculties are swift and powerful. 

**Saving Throw** DC 35 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 round; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94) 2 (1 round); **Stage 2** [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63) and stupefied 3 (1 round); **Stage 3** confused and stupefied 4 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Mindfog Mist
